meanings.definition: To say or write something in response to a question or statement.
meanings.sent1: She will reply to the email soon.
meanings.sent2: He always replies to messages promptly.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to reply with a meow when asked if it wanted food.
meanings.sent4: His actions replied louder than his words ever could.
meanings.sent5: The echo in the cave seemed to reply to every sound.

meanings.definition: A response to a question or statement.
meanings.sent1: I am waiting for her reply to my invitation.
meanings.sent2: The quick reply to the inquiry was appreciated.
meanings.sent3: The reply from the robot was unexpected and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the perfect reply to his apology.
meanings.sent5: The reply from the audience was a resounding applause.
